name: Advanced Forging
description: The Blacksmith wants to teach you advanced smithing techniques, but first you must prove your worth.

objectives.description: Defeat 1 Brutal Orc to prove your combat skills

dialogue.offer: You've proven yourself with that first weapon. Now, if you want to learn TRUE smithing, bring me proof of your combat prowess and a rare metal.
dialogue.accept: Excellent! Defeat a brutal orc to show your skill, and find me some rare metal. Only then will I share my advanced techniques.
dialogue.decline: Perhaps when you're more experienced, young one.
dialogue.progress: The advanced techniques require both combat experience and rare materials. Keep searching.
dialogue.complete: Impressive! You've truly grown as an adventurer. Here, take this master-crafted sword and the knowledge of advanced smithing.
dialogue.completed: You now possess the knowledge of advanced smithing. Use it wisely.
